author: Matthew Mulligan
title: Irish sheep farmer uses large pair of shears for lockdown haircut
description: A 62-year-old Irish sheep farmer Donie Anderson takes the DIY haircut to a new level.
content: While many people have resorted to home haircuts due to the closure of barbers and salons during the COVID-19 pandemic, 62-year-old Irish sheep farmer and sheepdog trainer Donie Anderson took things a step further, using a large pair of shears to trim his own… [+7794 chars]
